thread.title: Pennsylvania high court debate tonight to include all 7 candidates
thread.title_full: Pennsylvania high court debate tonight to include all 7 candidates - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Pennsylvania high court debate tonight to include all 7 candidates
text: HARRISBURG — The only scheduled debate among all the candidates for three open seats on the Pennsylvania Supreme Court is just hours away. Wednesday's forum at Widener University Law School in Harrisburg comes less than three weeks before the Nov. 3 election. Seven candidates are running — three... ...
